snippet: The viral disease known as Middle East Respiratory Syndrome has reached Asia, according to reports from Malaysia and the Philippines.
abstract: Reports from Malaysia and the Philippines reveal that viral disease known as Middle East Respiratory Syndrome has reached Asia.
lead_paragraph: The viral disease known as Middle East Respiratory Syndrome has reached Asia, according to reports from Malaysia and the Philippines.

headline.main: Viral Disease Spreads to Southeast Asia
headline.print_headline: Viral Disease Spreads to Southeast Asia
